name: autoclave
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of equipment that uses steam at high pressure to clean and remove all bacteria from objects used in medical operations and other equipment: The hospital sterilizes all surgical equipment in an autoclave. Licensed tattoo parlours must sterilise their equipment using hospital-standard autoclaves. Compare
sterilizer
brightstars/E+/GettyImages
